ygData.subject: Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: I used my first to pets religiously. I think they are useful for those levels. But once i hit 22, i never used my pet other than to practice my Evocation for
ygData.messageBody:
I used my first to pets religiously. I think they are
useful for those levels.
But once i hit 22, i never used my pet other than to
practice my Evocation for Ward Undead.

At this point i think the pets can be done away with.

Replace them with a line of shields like Shieldskin.
Or something damage oriented.

The debate about Banshee Aura making us too powerful
may keep us from getting that line instead of the Skin
line. Although an 8 point damage spell, i dont
believe, would make us over powered. We would have
gotten that spell at level 39. 8 points per hit to us
at level 39 would be useful, without being too much.
Sure we get hit alot, but what we are fighting will
have a lot of HP. It fits into our RP perfectly. We do
damage. Banshee does damage. Sounds like a match to
me.
Plus when they made this decision, no SKs were even
close to hitting 39. They did this very early in the
game. I dont see how they determined that we would be
too strong with it, when no one had even gotten it
yet.
Maybe some in the Betas, but im betting there werent
enough high level SKs i Beta for them to make a valid
decision.


Anyway thats it for now.

I'll torture you folks more a little later on


Bathory D'Allatu
